bike.description: High Modulus C-4 carbon w/RIB Tech, Integrated head tube w/1 1/2" lower, Integrated Aero seat tube, Internal cable routing, Oversized PIIS BB shell, Double water bottle mounts.. Rear triangle: High Modulus C-4 carbon thin seat stays, Oversized chain stay w/ETC and forged Aluminum drop out w/replaceable hanger

components.description: FC-440 Carbon Monocoque w/RIB Tech, Tapered Carbon steerer & carbon drop out
Shimano Ultegra STI shifter/brake, 20-speed, Flight Deck compatible
Oval W-530 Aero Alloy Clincher Wheelset,  30mm rim - 700c
Vittoria Rubino Pro II, 700x23c, Kevlar Bead-Folding
Oval RB-500 Forged Alloy Dual Pivot w/Cartridge Pads
Oval SR-700 Sweep w/ Ti Rails
C-4 Aero Carbon w/ Ritchey Clamp System
